home.clientDesc1: Due to browser restrictions such as file size limits, permissions and cross-domain issues, we strongly recommend using the desktop client: all operations are done locally.
home.clientDesc2: Supports high-speed multi-threaded downloading with stable performance.
home.clientDesc3: All decryption and merging are performed locally. Safe and reliable.
home.clientDesc4: Built-in M3U8 → MP4 conversion. No external cloud tools required.
home.clientDesc5: More AI media tools will be integrated into the client in the future.
home.inputPlaceholderM3u8: Paste the real m3u8 URL here
home.tipLocal: Tip: All parsing is done locally. No personal data is uploaded.
